Question: By contrast, this person did learn to speak Egyptian and represented herself as the reincarnation of an Egyptian goddess, Isis.
Hints: Her father was likely the uncle of this person's mother.
This person's son by Caesar, Caesarion, was proclaimed pharaoh by the Egyptians, after Alexandria fell to Octavian.
When his armies deserted him and joined with Octavian, he cried out that this person had betrayed him.
